hero.name: Aleksei
hero.description1: I am dedicated to developing software that is accessible,
hero.description2: efficient, and enjoyable for users of all backgrounds.

about.passionateDeveloper: I am a passionate Frontend Developer who specializes in React & JavaScript. I enjoy creating user-friendly software with clean design and interactivity. I work well in teams and have a knack for solving complex problems. Additionally, I have experience with Node.js and PostgreSQL. My focus is on crafting effective UI that connects users with applications, providing a seamless and responsive experience through visually appealing and intuitive design.

work.introduction: What I have done so far

experience.point1: Built interactive web applications, emphasizing user engagement and functionality.
experience.point2: Designed and implemented user experiences, aligning interactivity and data structures with business requirements.
experience.point3: Utilized a diverse technical stack, including HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, Material UI, Ant Design, JavaScript, React, Redux, Tailwind, Three.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
experience.point4: Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design, providing seamless user experiences across all platforms.
experience.company_name2: Golden Vault Financial Consulting Co., Ltd, Shanghai
experience.point5: Communicated with foreign companies for consultancy in business management and entering the Chinese market.
experience.point6: Was responsible for consulting support to Russian companies with business in China.
experience.point7: Efficiently communicated with website engineers, building the English and Russian websites in order to increase internet traffic.

projects.subtitle: My work
projects.title: Projects.
projects.text: Following projects showcase my skills and experiences through real-word examples of my work.
projects.jetsearch: A comprehensive travel booking platform(under development). It allows users to book flights, hotels, and rental cars, and offers curated recommendations for popular destinations.
projects.rms: Restaurant Management System is a comprehensive and fully responsive software solution designed to streamline restaurant operations. It offers a wide range of features that facilitate efficient management of various aspects such as order processing, menu customization, reservations, and reporting.
projects.emarket: An e-commerce website that provides a user-friendly platform for buying and selling products online. It includes personal accounts for the administrator, buyer, and seller.
projects.cocktails: A sophisticated and user-friendly cocktail recipe finder app, designed with the latest web development technologies.
projects.food: A food subscription landing page built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is fully responsive and has a mobile-friendly design.
